Name: PongPong Girl
About the game: Nice to meet you! During this special time, how is everything going? Cube Starman suddenly attack, and you've stepped up in order to protect the world! After a white-hot battle, it's time to relax! Come and meet the girls who adore you and show them your charm! Shoot, Smash, Level up, Collect items. FEATURES Crush all the Cube StarmanÔºÅ Private dates with 4 girls with different personalities! Random levels. Learn to upgrade 16 special abilities so that you can be more flexible in the battle. Unlock collections through responding to the girls' various questions, interact more! Review the unlocked dating scenes in the photo album. To All Players Thank you for your attention and support to PongPong Girl! This is our first game product and there is still a lot of room for improvement. We will continue to work hard to improve, and will launch more fun games in the future! Please take care of us in the future! Thanks again!
